dcterms:creator: K. Drossos
S. Lipping
T. Virtanen
dcterms:description: The Clotho v2 dataset consists of 5,929 audio clips, each with five human-written captions, making it suitable for audio-text retrieval. The clips last 15–30 seconds, and the captions contain 8–20 words. It is divided into development, validation, and evaluation splits.
dcterms:title: Clotho v2

dcterms:creator: C.D. Kim
B. Kim
H. Lee
G. Kim
dcterms:description: AudioCaps is a dataset designed for generating captions for audio in the wild, facilitating the study of audio-text retrieval with natural language descriptions.
dcterms:title: AudioCaps

dcterms:creator: S. Deshmukh
B. Elizalde
H. Wang
dcterms:description: WavText5K is a collection of audio-text pairs introduced for audio retrieval tasks, focusing on contrastive learning frameworks.
dcterms:title: WavText5K

dcterms:creator: F. Font
G. Roma
X. Serra
dcterms:description: The Freesound dataset provides a platform for sharing audio clips, which are used in various audio-related research tasks.
dcterms:title: Freesound
